title: Legal Aid Check Financial Eligibility create dependent payload schema
description: This schema defines the payload required to create one or more dependents and specify any income they may have  for the Legal Aid Check Financial Eligibility API

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth of the dependent

in_full_time_education.description: Whether or not the dependent is in full time education

income.description: An array of objects describing the dependent's income receipts during the calculation period

dependent_income_receipt.description: An object describing one income receipt by a dependent

date_of_payment.description: The date the dependent received this income

assessment_id.description: The UUID of the assessment returned from the call to the assessment endpoint

dependents.description: An array of objects describing the applicant's dependents
